creator: qingshijun@qq.com
text:
Hi *,

I am using a Linux system with Apache 2.4.10.
# apache2 -v
Server version: Apache/2.4.10 (Unix)
Server built:   Oct 13 2015 08:15:34

I like to use webdav and configured it correctly. 
It works fine so far. Now the problem:

The data for the webdav share is physical located on a storage device wich  available capacity is limited to 100GB.

when I try to copy a 3GB file on a "full" share, I get a incomplete file on the share and no error info on webdav-client(NetDrive2.4.0)
